title: Keep it fresh like Ananya Panday

Next Story : 9 ethnic styles you should try this festive season

New kid on the block Ananya Panday is making waves in Bollywood owing to her fresh beauty looks. She is always rocking a new makeup trend and stealing the hearts of many. While she doesn’t shy away from makeup, one thing is for sure, her skin is always radiant and clear. Banking on her flawless skin, she managed to rock the barely-there makeup trend with utmost elegance. If you want to achieve her level of radiance with minimal effort, follow up on this simple beauty decode.1. Indulge in a hydrating face mask for at least 15 minutes.2. Follow up by cleansing, toning, and moisturising your skin.3. Apply a pore minimising primer.4. Dab on a mattifying foundation and blend well with a damp makeup sponge.5. Use a lip and cheek tint for a soft touch of colour. Dab a bit of it on to your lids as well.6. Tight line your upper and lower lash line with black gel eyeliner.7. Define your lashes with mascara.8. Spritz on a makeup setting spray.
description: Adopt a fresh approach to beauty like Ananya Panday. Here is how you can achieve her radiance through your beauty regime. Adopt a fresh approach to beauty like
